translation.LAUNCH_MESSAGE: Yo, welcome to, is it safe.
translation.ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, I didn't understand that request.
translation.LOCATION_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, there was a problem getting the location of your device.
translation.DATA_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, there was an error getting local crime data.
translation.WEIRD_ERROR: Sorry, there was some kind of weird error.
translation.PERMISSION_MESSAGE: Oh bummer. You haven't enabled location permissions. I need your post code to give you what you want. You can enable it in you Alexa app on your phone thing.
FINAL_RESPONSES: What do you think this is, a choose your own adventure book? There's no more stuff.
Oh man. I really can't be bothered.
Oh, did I ask if you wanted some more? I don't know why I did that, cos there ain't any more.
Haha, tricked you. There's is no more.
Urgh. Nope. I can't be bothered.
You've been very naughty, so I'm not going to tell you any more.
translation.TOTAL_CRIME: There was only 1 crime reported within a mile of your house last month.
translation.TOTAL_CRIMES: There were {num} crimes reported within a mile of your house last month.
translation.NO_BREAKDOWN: Well, like I said. There wasn't any crime in your area last month.
